Title: SampleCMS is a simple CMS that uses .NET 4.0 API. ASP.NET CMS
Description: SampleCMS is a simple CMS that implements Membership API, Navigation API, themes, master pages that show a very simple way to manage virtual pages, contents and select layout for each page or use a default. The project can grow, but not much because the keyword is "simple".
HomeWiki:
SampleCMS is a simple CMS that implements Membership API, Navigation API, themes, master pages that show a very simple way to manage virtual pages, contents and select layout for each page or use a default. The project can grow, but not much because the keyword is "simple".
